subject: YYYessss! It works.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_2c4f_3d36_79ca
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

The tiny echo box works just fine. It was kinda weird, cuz before I started 
recording "they" were speaking direct, and called me by name, very loud and 
clear, but when I started recording they seems to go away, even though there 
was plenty of broadcast fragments heard, but there was some good voices that 
came though. I only did about a three minute session tonight.

Frank
